short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PVU Farm mode extended display. No automations or any bots included in this extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PVU Farm Extended Extension will boost gardener's productivity on monitoring the farm. Plants that are on farming stage are accessible on popup screen outside the farm page on PVU. The extension includes realtime countdown of harvest time, extended information for plants, tools, etc.

Additional Features to be supported outside the game are as follows:
- Calendar
- Chrome and in-app notification for crows, harvest time, etc.
- Wallet information, realtime PVU token value, in currency conversion, etc.
- Show your plants to your friend, messaging.
- additional information.
